::Jhiaxus::
   
  Jhiaxus: So should I lock her up in a holding cell?

xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:
          Hydras/Perceptor:


Hydras looked to his companions and afater that at Nightlight and 
said with a ironical tone "It's time to show our guest her new 
quarters and after that we have a lot stuff to discuss... Perceptor, 
it's time that you go to do the final touch in the tramp"

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
>
> ::Scorponok/Lord Jhiaxus::
> 
> The pile out of the shuttle. Jhiaxus is still shoving Nightlight. 
He obviously enjoys hurting her at every oportunity.
> 
> Scorponok: Thermo-kenetic energy source. Quite genious really.
> 
> Jhiaxus looks around at the statues. He was one part proud to see 
that the base was steeped in Decepticon design over Predacon but also 
hated the fact that it represented the "old" Decepticons. The second 
generation was so far beyond them. He did notice the absense of a 
statue for Starscream. Jhiaxus chuckled to himself. Although he and 
Starscream were the co-leaders of the Generation 2 Decepticon Empire 
they of course had friction between them.
> 
>
